apis.name: List managed licenses
apis.description: Get all managed licenses for a given project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: managed_license_id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded name of the license belonging to the project

apis.name: Create a new managed license
apis.description: Creates a new managed license for the given project with the given name and approval status.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the managed license

attributes.name: approval_status
attributes.description: The approval status of the license. “allowed” or “denied”. “blacklisted” and “approved” are deprecated.

apis.name: Delete a managed license
apis.description: When successful, it replies with an HTTP 204 response.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: managed_license_id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded name of the license belonging to the project

apis.name: Edit an existing managed license
apis.description: Updates an existing managed license with a new approval status.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: managed_license_id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded name of the license belonging to the project

attributes.name: approval_status
attributes.description: The approval status of the license. “allowed” or “denied”. “blacklisted” and “approved” are deprecated.
